name: Chameleon Colors
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

You will have a few seconds to memorize a color pattern, shown on the art canvas.Help the chameleon blend in by matching the color pattern. Use the mouse to click on each corresponding square and choose a color.



When you think you have it matched, click "Hide."If you get it right, you will be invisible to the predator -- a ferociously fanged fish! If you  get it wrong, you'll be fish food!

CREDITS:
Created for the Weekly Game Jam #147, where the theme was "Invisible." 

Art and Music by Tomatohorse

Unity programming (color matching levels) by Dilanas

Unity programming (fly catching level) by Mike_VulcanGaming
